page.title: 18ATTITUDES TO LIFE
page.content: Most people who live in South Cave are very happy with their village. During our school holidays we did a questionnaire with the people in our neighbourhood. This is what we found. Many people are commuters and they have their own transport. They use the few food shops in the village. Any large purchases such as clothes or furniture are usually made outside of South Cave. For most of their entertainment, theatre or cinema they must leave the village. But most families use the Sports Centre for some reason. A number of people would like to see a swimming pool added to the Sports Centre. The teenagers would like more to do and the younger people would like a BMX track.
